Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've noticed several brown, greasy-looking spots on my forehead that I can't seem to peel off.
Great, thank you for sharing that information! Can you tell me, what is your age and gender?
I'm a 77-year-old man.

Thank you for letting me know. Based on your symptoms, I would like to ask you a few more questions to help narrow down the possible causes of the brown, greasy-looking spots on your forehead.

Have you noticed any changes in your skin over the past few months or years? For example, have you noticed any new growths, changes in the color or texture of your skin, or any itching or burning sensations?
No, just these recent brown spots that look greasy and won't peel off.

Thank you for letting me know. Based on your symptoms, it's possible that you may have a condition called seborrheic keratosis.

Seborrheic keratosis is a common, benign skin condition that causes the growth of brown or black spots on the skin, often on the face, chest, or back. These spots can be rough and scaly, and may look greasy or oily. They are usually not harmful, but they can be aesthetically unappealing.

Can you tell me if you have any family history of seborrheic keratosis or other skin conditions?
I'm sorry, I don't recall any family history of skin conditions.

No worries! In that case, based on your symptoms, I would recommend scheduling an appointment with a dermatologist for a proper evaluation. They will be able to examine your skin and provide a definitive diagnosis, as well as recommend the best course of treatment.

In the meantime, you can try using a gentle cleanser and moisturizer to help keep your skin clean and hydrated. Avoid picking or scratching at the spots, as this can lead to irritation and potentially cause further problems.

Remember, it's always better to be safe than sorry when it comes to your health, so don't hesitate to seek medical attention if you have any concerns.

Final diagnosis: Seborrheic keratosis.

Here are some possible treatment options for the brown spots on your forehead:
